entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 near noon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 31 March 2023
